long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A "Web color inverter tool" is a online utility designed to invert or reverse the colors of a web page. The primary purpose of this tool is to enhance accessibility and readability for users who may have visual impairments or difficulties with certain color combinations.

The tool takes the existing color scheme of a webpage and inversely changes the colors. For example, black text on a white background might become white text on a black background.

Users often have the option to toggle the color inversion on or off based on their preferences. This allows for a customizable experience.

Inverting colors can be beneficial for users with conditions like photophobia (sensitivity to light) or certain types of color blindness. It can also improve readability for users who find high contrast more comfortable.
